goals__remit: CEMA is the European association representing the agricultural machinery industry. It represents and promotes the interests of this industry sector on a European level by co-ordinating the views of the national associations and their members. It provides know-how of the sector to the European institutions and other organizations to achieve a fair competitive environment via harmonized standards and regulations. It also informs members about the latest developments in related European legislation.
relevant_communication: Detailed information and regular updates are available on: www.cema-agri.org
